mapper.select: SELECT TPF.NO AS TBL_PRJ_FAQ_NO, TPF.REF_PRJ_NO AS TBL_PRJ_FAQ_REF_PRJ_NO, TPF.TITLE AS TBL_PRJ_FAQ_TITLE, TPF.CONTENT AS TBL_PRJ_FAQ_CONTENT, TPF.REGIST_DATE AS TBL_PRJ_FAQ_REGIST_DATE FROM TBL_PRJ_FAQ TPF JOIN TBL_PRJ PRJ ON PRJ.NO = TPF.REF_PRJ_NO WHERE TPF.REF_PRJ_NO = #{projectNo} AND PRJ.REF_MEMBER_NO = #{userNo}
